official_title: A bill to authorize construction of the project for navigation at Gulfport Harbor, Mississippi.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a specified navigation project at Gulfport Harbor, Mississippi. Directs that dredged material from such project shall be disposed of in open water in the Gulf of Mexico.

titles.title: A bill to authorize construction of the project for navigation at Gulfport Harbor, Mississippi.
